currency_rate.help: Conversion rate from company currency to order currency.

active.help: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the pricelist without removing it.

selection: Show public price & discount to the customer

config_id.help: The physical point of sale you will use.

sequence_number.help: A sequence number that is incremented with each order

login_number.help: A sequence number that is incremented each time a user resumes the pos session

cash_register_balance_end_real.help: Total of closing cash control lines.

cash_register_balance_start.help: Total of opening cash control lines.

cash_register_total_entry_encoding.help: Total of all paid sales orders

cash_register_balance_end.help: Sum of opening balance and transactions.

cash_register_difference.help: Difference between the theoretical closing balance and the real closing balance.

rescue.help: Auto-generated session for orphan orders, ignored in constraints

update_stock_at_closing.string: Stock should be updated at closing

crm_team_id.help: This Point of sale's sales will be related to this Sales Team.

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_unread.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

posted_before.help: Technical field for knowing if the move has been posted before

to_check.help: If this checkbox is ticked, it means that the user was not sure of all the related information at the time of the creation of the move and that the move needs to be checked again.

country_code.help:
The ISO country code in two chars. 
You can use this field for quick search.

user_id.help: Technical field used to fit the generic behavior in mail templates.

is_move_sent.help: It indicates that the invoice/payment has been sent.

partner_bank_id.help: Bank Account Number to which the invoice will be paid. A Company bank account if this is a Customer Invoice or Vendor Credit Note, otherwise a Partner bank account number.

payment_reference.help: The payment reference to set on journal items.

amount_by_group.help: Edit Tax amounts if you encounter rounding issues.

tax_cash_basis_rec_id.help: Technical field used to keep track of the tax cash basis reconciliation. This is needed when cancelling the source: it will post the inverse journal entry to cancel that part too.

tax_cash_basis_move_id.help: The journal entry from which this tax cash basis journal entry has been created.

auto_post.help: If this checkbox is ticked, this entry will be automatically posted at its date.

fiscal_position_id.help: Fiscal positions are used to adapt taxes and accounts for particular customers or sales orders/invoices. The default value comes from the customer.

invoice_origin.help: The document(s) that generated the invoice.

invoice_incoterm_id.help: International Commercial Terms are a series of predefined commercial terms used in international transactions.

qr_code_method.help: Type of QR-code to be generated for the payment of this invoice, when printing it. If left blank, the first available and usable method will be used.

invoice_cash_rounding_id.help: Defines the smallest coinage of the currency that can be used to pay by cash.

invoice_filter_type_domain.help: Technical field used to have a dynamic domain on journal / taxes in the form view.

bank_partner_id.help: Technical field to get the domain on the bank

invoice_has_matching_suspense_amount.help: Technical field used to display an alert on invoices if there is at least a matching amount in any supsense account.

tax_lock_date_message.help: Technical field used to display a message when the invoice's accounting date is prior of the tax lock date.

restrict_mode_hash_table.help: If ticked, the accounting entry or invoice receives a hash as soon as it is posted and cannot be modified anymore.

debit_note_ids.help: The debit notes created for this invoice

edi_state.help: The aggregated state of all the EDIs of this move

edi_error_count.help: How many EDIs are in error for this move ?

edi_web_services_to_process.help: Technical field to display the documents that will be processed by the CRON

purchase_vendor_bill_id.help: Auto-complete from a past bill / purchase order.

purchase_id.help: Auto-complete from a past purchase order.

l10n_sa_delivery_date.help: In case of multiple deliveries, you should take the date of the latest one.

cryptographic_uuid.help: This will help to identify cryptographic hash uuid

sha256.help: This will help to identify hash code

l10n_sa_qr_code_str.help: This will help to identify QR code

si_remaining_hours.help: Shows the remaining hours to report Simplified Invoice

last_time_sent.help: Last time the e-invoices was sent.

campaign_id.help: This is a name that helps you keep track of your different campaign efforts, e.g. Fall_Drive, Christmas_Special

source_id.help: This is the source of the link, e.g. Search Engine, another domain, or name of email list

medium_id.help: This is the method of delivery, e.g. Postcard, Email, or Banner Ad

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_unread.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

user_id.help: Person who uses the cash register. It can be a reliever, a student or an interim employee.

sequence_number.help: A session-unique sequence number for the order

config_id.help: The physical point of sale you will use.

invoice_group.help: Enables invoice generation from the Point of Sale.

sale_journal.help: Accounting journal used to post sales entries.

currency_rate.help: The rate of the currency to the currency of rate applicable at the date of the order

customer_note.help: This is a note destined to the customer

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_unread.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

sequence.help: Gives the sequence order when displaying a product list

description_sale.help: A description of the Product that you want to communicate to your customers. This description will be copied to every Sales Order, Delivery Order and Customer Invoice/Credit Note

categ_id.help: Select category for the current product

list_price.help: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

lst_price.help: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

standard_price.help:
In Standard Price & AVCO: value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        In FIFO: value of the next unit that will leave the stock (automatically computed).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.

pricelist_id.help: Technical field. Used for searching on pricelists, not stored in database.

uom_id.help: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.

uom_po_id.help: Default unit of measure used for purchase orders. It must be in the same category as the default unit of measure.

packaging_ids.help: Gives the different ways to package the same product.

active.help: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.

taxes_id.help: Default taxes used when selling the product.

supplier_taxes_id.help: Default taxes used when buying the product.

property_account_income_id.help: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category.

property_account_expense_id.help: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category. If anglo-saxon accounting with automated valuation method is configured, the expense account on the product category will be used.

responsible_id.help: This user will be responsible of the next activities related to logistic operations for this product.

type.help:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

property_stock_production.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated by manufacturing orders.

property_stock_inventory.help: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated when you do an inventory.

sale_delay.help: Delivery lead time, in days. It's the number of days, promised to the customer, between the confirmation of the sales order and the delivery.

tracking.help: Ensure the traceability of a storable product in your warehouse.

has_available_route_ids.string: Routes can be selected on this product

show_on_hand_qty_status_button.string: Show On Hand Qty Status Button

produce_delay.help: Average lead time in days to manufacture this product. In the case of multi-level BOM, the manufacturing lead times of the components will be added.

property_account_creditor_price_differen.help: This account is used in automated inventory valuation to record the price difference between a purchase order and its related vendor bill when validating this vendor bill.

purchase_method.help:
On ordered quantities: Control bills based on ordered quantities.
On received quantities: Control bills based on received quantities.

purchase_line_warn.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

cost_method.help:
Standard Price: The products are valued at their standard cost defined on the product.
        Average Cost (AVCO): The products are valued at weighted average cost.
        First In First Out (FIFO): The products are valued supposing those that enter the company first will also leave it first.

valuation.help:
Manual: The accounting entries to value the inventory are not posted automatically.
        Automated: An accounting entry is automatically created to value the inventory when a product enters or leaves the company.

available_in_pos.help: Check if you want this product to appear in the Point of Sale.

to_weight.help: Check if the product should be weighted using the hardware scale integration.

pos_categ_id.help: Category used in the Point of Sale.

purchase_requisition.help: Create a draft purchase order: Based on your product configuration, the system will create a draft purchase order.Propose a call for tender : If the 'purchase_requisition' module is installed and this option is selected, the system will create a draft call for tender.

route_ids.help: Depending on the modules installed, this will allow you to define the route of the product: whether it will be bought, manufactured, replenished on order, etc.

service_type.help:
Manually set quantities on order: Invoice based on the manually entered quantity, without creating an analytic account.
Timesheets on contract: Invoice based on the tracked hours on the related timesheet.
Create a task and track hours: Create a task on the sales order validation and track the work hours.

sale_line_warn.help: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

expense_policy.help: Expenses and vendor bills can be re-invoiced to a customer.With this option, a validated expense can be re-invoice to a customer at its cost or sales price.

invoice_policy.help:
Ordered Quantity: Invoice quantities ordered by the customer.
Delivered Quantity: Invoice quantities delivered to the customer.

is_selection_combo.help: This will use for Selecting items from Combo Pack

service_to_purchase.help: If ticked, each time you sell this product through a SO, a RfQ is automatically created to buy the product. Tip: don't forget to set a vendor on the product.

lounge_price.help: This is the price to be used in charging the lunge customers

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_unread.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

origin.help: Reference of the document that generated this sales order request.

reference.help: The payment communication of this sale order.

date_order.help:
Creation date of draft/sent orders,
Confirmation date of confirmed orders.

require_signature.help: Request a online signature to the customer in order to confirm orders automatically.

require_payment.help: Request an online payment to the customer in order to confirm orders automatically.

create_date.help: Date on which sales order is created.

pricelist_id.help: If you change the pricelist, only newly added lines will be affected.

analytic_account_id.help: The analytic account related to a sales order.

amount_by_group.help: type: [(name, amount, base, formated amount, formated base)]

currency_rate.help: The rate of the currency to the currency of rate 1 applicable at the date of the order

fiscal_position_id.help: Fiscal positions are used to adapt taxes and accounts for particular customers or sales orders/invoices.The default value comes from the customer.

signed_by.help: Name of the person that signed the SO.

commitment_date.help: This is the delivery date promised to the customer. If set, the delivery order will be scheduled based on this date rather than product lead times.

show_update_pricelist.help:
Technical Field, True if the pricelist was changed;
 this will then display a recomputation button

incoterm.help: International Commercial Terms are a series of predefined commercial terms used in international transactions.

picking_policy.help: If you deliver all products at once, the delivery order will be scheduled based on the greatest product lead time. Otherwise, it will be based on the shortest.

effective_date.help: Completion date of the first delivery order.

expected_date.help: Delivery date you can promise to the customer, computed from the minimum lead time of the order lines in case of Service products. In case of shipping, the shipping policy of the order will be taken into account to either use the minimum or maximum lead time of the order lines.

json_popover.string: JSON data for the popover widget

campaign_id.help: This is a name that helps you keep track of your different campaign efforts, e.g. Fall_Drive, Christmas_Special

source_id.help: This is the source of the link, e.g. Search Engine, another domain, or name of email list

medium_id.help: This is the method of delivery, e.g. Postcard, Email, or Banner Ad

activity_state.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_unread.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_needaction_counter.help: Number of messages which requires an action

message_has_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.help: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

is_reconciled.help: Technical field indicating if the payment is already reconciled.

is_matched.help: Technical field indicating if the payment has been matched with a statement line.
is_matched.string: Is Matched With a Bank Statement

qr_code.help: QR-code report URL to use to generate the QR-code to scan with a banking app to perform this payment.

payment_method_id.help:
Manual: Get paid by cash, check or any other method outside of Odoo.
Electronic: Get paid automatically through a payment acquirer by requesting a transaction on a card saved by the customer when buying or subscribing online (payment token).
Check: Pay bill by check and print it from Odoo.
Batch Deposit: Encase several customer checks at once by generating a batch deposit to submit to your bank. When encoding the bank statement in Odoo, you are suggested to reconcile the transaction with the batch deposit.To enable batch deposit, module account_batch_payment must be installed.
SEPA Credit Transfer: Pay bill from a SEPA Credit Transfer file you submit to your bank. To enable sepa credit transfer, module account_sepa must be installed

hide_payment_method.help: Technical field used to hide the payment method if the selected journal has only one available which is 'manual'

payment_reference.help: Reference of the document used to issue this payment. Eg. check number, file name, etc.

reconciled_invoice_ids.help: Invoices whose journal items have been reconciled with these payments.

reconciled_bill_ids.help: Invoices whose journal items have been reconciled with these payments.

payment_method_code.help: Technical field used to adapt the interface to the payment type selected.

show_partner_bank_account.help: Technical field used to know whether the field `partner_bank_id` needs to be displayed or not in the payments form views

require_partner_bank_account.help: Technical field used to know whether the field `partner_bank_id` needs to be required or not in the payments form views

country_code.help:
The ISO country code in two chars. 
You can use this field for quick search.

payment_token_id.help: Note that tokens from acquirers set to only authorize transactions (instead of capturing the amount) are not available.
